description:
We are Sapphire - a Digital Marketing Agency based in Los Angeles, California that specializes in Performance Content Solutions for brands e.g. Disney, Tiktok, PUBG, and Tencent. Our vision is “performance through content” where we help brands grow through video content creation, viral marketing, and social media campaigns.


We are looking for creative, talented and hacky individuals to join our Content Creation team to produce high performing video content across our client portfolio. With this internship, you’ll learn the end to end process of video content creation for multiple global brands across major media platforms (Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, Tiktok), and you will also have the opportunity to develop your acting and/or video editing skills for digital ad production. 




Content Creation Internship:


Responsibilities:

  • Brainstorm creative and viral content ideas for global brands targeting the Gen Z demo 

  • Produce compelling video content for digital marketing distribution

  • Assist in ad content optimization through production and video editing


Requirements:

  • Passion for digital content creation 

  • Basic video editing knowledge and skill set 

  • Deadline focused with exceptional time-management

  • Strong problem-solving skills 

  • Excellent communication skills and works in teams


Job Type: 

  • Part-time


Internship Pay: 

  • $25/hour


Schedule: 

  • Monday to Friday 


Hours per week: 

  • Flexible


Experience: 

  • Social Media Marketing: 1 year (Preferred) 

  • Video Content Creation: 1 year (Preferred)

  • Video Editing/Production: 1 year (Preferred)

Education: 

  • Currently pursuing an Associate’s or Bachelor’s degree
